title: PBE question
body: hey im currently new to league of legend and i hear of a client called PBE, can i play it, and how to do it?

replies.body: The PBE is currently down for maintenance, so it's not possible to apply or make an account.   We'll be posting updates about its status on the[ PBE Service Status](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe) page.  I appreciate your interest to participate, but hang tight for now!
